changesets.comments: ui: added filter showing supported operating systems by server, refs #372
ui: bitflag checkboxes for menus refs #372
ui: replaced buggy bitflag checkbox, minor ui alignment fixes

details.name: description
details.old_value:
It's time to think about a way to let online players know which OS (or mod binary) is supported on the server. 

* Parse server mod pk3s for supported OS binaries -> create a list (populate 'osFlags' - might be done while q3 gamepath is created)

* Add new serverinfo cvar 'osFlags'
1 - Windows
2 - Linux
4 - Apple
8 - AROS
16 - Pandora
32 - MorphOS
64 - Android
...tbc

* Add a new filter to gamebrowser

journals.notes:
g_oss (os support) cvar has been added.

{FIXME}
- add a filter to server browser
- auto setup this cvar & parse the binaries in path (atm admins have to set this cvar explicitly)
- add a warning when client tries to connect a server with unsupported os

subject: Let the server show supported client OS
description:
It's time to think about a way to let online players know which OS (or mod binary) is supported on the server. 

* Parse server mod pk3s for supported OS binaries -> create a list (populate 'osFlags' - might be done while q3 gamepath is created)

* Add new serverinfo cvar 'osFlags'
1 - Windows
2 - Linux
4 - Linux64
8 - Apple
16 - AROS
32 - Pandora
64 - MorphOS
128 - Android
...tbc

* Add a new filter to gamebrowser
